content:
isaacvetter opened PR
from isaacvetter-patch-1 to master

Create the fhircast scope, which is used by an app to request the ability to synchronize to a session.

Document the three launch/authorization scenarios work.

Still need to flesh out the session discovery service that the hub makes available to apps for more complex sync scenarios.
